```{r}
# Install packages
library(sf)
library(stars)
library()
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(rgeos)
```

1a. Reproject secondary roads.

secondary_roads (GEOMETRY FILE) --> [Reproject] to EPSG:32736 - WGS 84 / UTM zone 36S

Inputs: secondary_roads
Outputs: unnamed intermediate "1a_output"
Possible functions: rgdal::readogr, st::st_transform
```{r}

```

1b. Rasterize secondary roads.

"1a output" (GEOMETRY FILE) --> [Rasterize]

Inputs: "1a output"
Outputs: unnamed intermediate "secondary_roads_raster"
Possible functions: rgdal::readogr, stars::st_rasterize
```{r}

```

2. Clip landcover by raster extent of initial_clip.

landcover (GEOMETRY FILE) [CLIP] initial_clip (GEOMETRY FILE)

Inputs: landcover, intial_clip
Outputs: unnamed intermediate
Possible functions: rgdal::readogr, raster::raster

```{r}

```
